tool.name: Match isobaric quant peptide tables

param.name: qaccpattern
param.label: Regular expression pattern to identify peptide sequence column in quanted peptides

param.name: isobqcolpattern
param.label: Regular expression pattern to identify quantification columns in quanted peptides

tool.help: If you have two peptide tables, one of which contains quantified peptides and the other one contains other data on the same peptides, this tool will match the tables.
